User Security API

The User Security API is a web service that provides functionality for managing user authentication and authorization. It offers various endpoints to perform operations related to user management and security.

Functionality

The API offers the following functionality:

  • User Registration: Allows users to create a new account by providing their username, name, lastname, password, email, and other relevant details.
  • User Authentication: Provides endpoints to authenticate users by validating their credentials, such as username and password.
  • User Authorization: Implements a role-based access control system where users are assigned different roles and permissions. The API allows for managing roles, assigning roles to users, and associating permissions with roles.
  • User Management: Enables operations for managing user accounts, including retrieving user details, updating user information, and deleting user accounts.
  • Token Generation: Supports the generation of tokens for user sessions and secure communication between the client and server.
  • Auditing: Includes functionality for logging and auditing user activities, tracking changes made to user accounts, and recording relevant information for security and compliance purposes.

The User Security API provides a secure and reliable solution for managing user authentication, authorization, and related security aspects in your application.

For detailed information about the API endpoints and their usage, please refer to the API documentation.

Feel free to explore the API and leverage its capabilities to enhance the security of your application and protect user data.

Please note that this is a high-level overview of the User Security API and does not include implementation details or specific technical specifications.
